name: Ber'Tho Alpha
description: After decades of silence, the Breen Confederacy have finally made their move. The most formidable warriors in the Alpha Quadrant have identified the value of Isogen and other Progenitor remnants, and decided to invest their front line in acquiring as much of it as possible. The Breen have struck a temporary alliance with the Corvallen to more efficiently research the Origin Sector, and with the Bolians to transform their ideas into reality. This mighty civilization is preparing for something big...
